Uses of Package
com.appglu.android.task

Packages that use com.appglu.android.task
com.appglu.android.storage Contains the Storage API implementation for Android.
The Storage API has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.
 
com.appglu.android.sync Contains the Sync API implementation for Android.
The Sync API is used to synchronize the data in your local SQLite tables with the AppGlu server.
 
com.appglu.android.task   
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.task used by com.appglu.android.storage
ImageViewAsyncCallback
          AsyncCallback implementation to load image Bitmaps into a ImageView, displaying a progress View while the image is being loaded and a place holder View if the image fails loading.
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.task used by com.appglu.android.sync
ImageViewAsyncCallback
          AsyncCallback implementation to load image Bitmaps into a ImageView, displaying a progress View while the image is being loaded and a place holder View if the image fails loading.
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.task used by com.appglu.android.task
AppGluAsyncTask
          Extension of Android's AsyncTask to add AppGluAsyncTask.onException(Exception) and AppGluAsyncTask.onFinished(boolean) callbacks.
AsyncTaskCompat
          This class was copied from Ice Cream Sandwich to make it possible to execute tasks with a serial thread pool executor on Android versions before HONEYCOMB.
AsyncTaskCompat.Status
           
AsyncTaskExecutor.AbstractSerialExecutor
          Base class for Executors.
AsyncTaskExecutor.NativeQueueExecutor
          Only available for Android HONEYCOMB and up.
ImageViewAsyncCallback.ImageDownloadListener
          Provide callbacks methods when the image is being downloaded in background.
